problem: If Sally has 5 red apples and gives 2 to her friend, how many red apples does Sally have left?
There are 9 birds sitting on a tree branch. 3 of them fly away. How many birds are left on the branch?
John has 4 toy cars. He buys 2 more at the store. How many toy cars does John have now?
Maria has 7 pencils, and she gives 3 of them to her sister. How many pencils does Maria have left?
There are 12 candies in a jar. If 5 candies are taken out, how many candies are left in the jar?
Lucy has 8 marbles. She loses 2 marbles while playing. How many marbles does Lucy have now?
Tom has 10 baseball cards. He trades 4 of them with his friend. How many baseball cards does Tom have left?
In a basket, there are 15 colorful balloons. If 9 balloons pop, how many balloons are still in the basket?
There are 20 students in a class. If 7 students are absent, how many students are present in the class?
If there are 6 cookies on a plate and Sarah eats 3 of them, how many cookies are left on the plate?
